strings.s: I... I'm sorry to disturb you, sir...
Oh... Don't be sorry, honey... I knew you would do it sooner or later...
What... What do you mean...
You really want to get out, right?
Yes... I came here in an important mission... I need to find...
I don't give a shit about what you came here for, you know?
Oh... I'm sorry... I mean...
Come on, honey... I know what you want... I know how this works... By your looks, I thought you'd have some good money to buy your way out of here..
I have, but... Not here...
Now that's a shame... This is a very stressfull work, you know... But the 'tips' I receive from prisioners usually make it worth...
As you don't have any money... If you could do something to help me relax, then I could help with you lack of freedom problem...
To relax... Like... a foot massage... I studied the ancient technique once... I don't be tickling or nothing....
Really... How about you massage my cock?
Oh...
What? Not subtle enough to you? Sorry, but I'm tired of your bullshit...
I'll help you... Here... Look at this...
Get your hands down here and start working your technique... earn your freedom...
Hey... You won't be able to work well from that far... Come closer...
I can't believe this is happening to me...
_What am I doing... I never even touched one these..._

Come on... It won't bite you... Don't you want to get out of here?
Yeah... Come here... I can already feel the heat of your fingers...

Hey... This is not your first time doig this, is it? Just get a good grip of it...

Now get started or I will give up on our agreement...
_Forgive me, father..._
Yeeeeaah... You have a nice touch, honey... Look what you did...

Uuuhh... So... We won't have much progress like this...

Come on, now... Show me your moves...
That's nice, honey... You are a natural...
How about speed up the pace, now...
Come on... Faster, honey...
Very good... Now keep the pace for me...
This is awesome, honey... Now... Give me a show of your tits... It will help me finish this faster...
Sigh... Fine... You're doing a good job and I'm about to finish this anyways...
Good girl... Good girl...
So... You wanna act like a bitch? I can be nasty too...
What are you doing...
Don't you dare put this shirt down... With your lousy job I'll need a visual aid to finish...
OBEY

Oh man... This is it... Hold tight...
Such obedient girl... Continue like this and you will go far, honey...
Thanks, honey... You have a talent...
Thanks, honey... You have a talent...
Thanks, honey... You have a talent...
You have to learn how to respect your man, girl...
You have to learn how to respect your man, girl...
Can I leave now?
Yeah... You'll got your payment...
I'll take a walk out there for a few minutes... If some prisioner happen to escape now, no one would notice...
Oh lord... My hand...
Yeah... Another reward for your hard work... Make a good use of it...
Don't be long, now... I hope you see you again... People are always leaving and coming back, you know...
I... I... need to leave again...
I know you do, honey... And you know what you need to do in order to get released, right? You did it once...
If... If I do that thing again... Then can I leave?
Wait... You need to ask properly... I don't know what 'that thing' means...
Come on... I wanna hear you saying it...
_Oh Lord..._
If I... If I massage... your... penis... would you let me leave?
No, I won't...
What?
I know you're eager to put your hands in my cock again... But each time you ask me to turn a blind eye and let you go, the price gets higher...
You'll have to blow me this time, honey....
Blow you? You mean... Because it's so hot in here? Wouldn't it be easier to get a fan?

What I mean is that you'll have to suck my cock...
Ha... I love the face you do when I start being direct...
Now come over here... It's time to earn your freedom again...

Shhh... Just keep your nice work...
